vclaim: In April 2021, the frozen steaks company, Steak-umms, disagreed with astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson on Twitter, and tweeted “Log off bro,” after he posted his views on scientific truth.
title: Did Steak-umms Tell Neil deGrasse Tyson on Twitter to ‘Log Off Bro’?
subtitle: The frozen steaks brand had some beef with the astrophysicist.
author: Nur Ibrahim
